titles.title: RED SNAPPER Act
RED SNAPPER Act
Regionally Empowered Decision-making for Snapper, Noting the Angling Public and the Preservation of an Exceptional Resource Act
Regionally Empowered Decision-making for Snapper, Noting the Angling Public and the Preservation of an Exceptional Resource Act
A bill to amend the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act to provide for management of red snapper in the Gulf of Mexico, and for other purposes.
RED SNAPPER Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
